action.action-desc: Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit taking or transmitting video of defense information, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Drone Espionage Act.

section.header: Taking or transmitting video of defense information prohibited
section.text: Section 793 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by inserting video, after photographic negative, each place such term appears.
